Hi Narendra,

It depends what you want to test exactly and what type of tests you wish
to execute. Cactus' feature to unit test JSPs are listed here: 

http://jakarta.apache.org/cactus/writing/howto_jsp.html

Hope it helps,
-Vincent

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Narendra S [mailto:snarendra@...]
> Sent: 30 July 2003 14:07
> To: junit@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: [junit] Should I use Cactus or HttpUnit?
> 
> Hi,
> 
> I would like to unit test JSP's. After going through junit.org I
> understand
> that JSP's can be tested either
> using cactus or HttpUnit. Can you advice me on which tool should I go
in
> for? What is the difference between these 2 tools?
> 
> Regards
> Narendra
